institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Continuing employment incentive payment and operating rules/Article 1 (Purpose)
contents: Article 1 (Purpose) This rule provides incentives for continuing employment in accordance with the Skills and Technology Promotion Act (hereinafter referred to as the *Act), the Enforcement Decree of the same Act (hereinafter referred to as the *Decree), and the Enforcement Rules of the same Act (hereinafter referred to as the *Enforcement Rules). The purpose is to stipulate the details necessary for payment.
